name: Kids Jeans Makeover: Design & Decorate
description:
You have just started a new kid's clothing line, and you need to decorate a custom pair of jeans that kids your age are sure to love. Be creative and use your knowledge of the latest trends to guide you as you create a denim masterpiece in this fun decoration game for girls.

Browse the wide selection of colorful materials, girly patterns, funky patches and more, to create the next big thing in kid's fashion! Have fun!
